showScoreExcerpt:
“Line by line, Between Riverside and Crazy delivers as much pleasure as any play in New York right now. Guirgis captures the ear (and mind and heart) of the city with uncanny accuracy in dialogue that is rich, rough, and vibrant. See it for that, the memorable supporting cast, and Henderson, a great actor, in the role of his career.”

Read more
